section.title: The <rich:contextMenu> if rendered completely disables right mouse click on a page
Description
section.para: The <rich:contextMenu> component if rendered disables a right mouse click on a page by default in RichFaces 3.3.0.

section.title: How to reproduce
section.para: Checkout RichFaces Live Demo 3.3.0, run it, and proceed to the Context Menu page. If you right click on the image <rich:contextMenu> appears. If you click anywhere else, the right click will be non functional.

section.title: Causes
section.para: The <rich:contextMenu> in RichFaces 3.3.0 completely disables right mouse click on a page by default.

section.title: Workarounds
section.para: Update to RichFaces 3.3.1. By default, the <rich:contextMenu> in RichFaces 3.3.1 completely disables right mouse click in the Context Menu area only.
